I have included an example in the source code, which shows how to create a new mutable password.

Bacially...

1. Create class and extend abstract class MutablePassword

{{{
Public class NewPassword extends MutablePassword {

// implements methods
}
}}}


2. Add the new mutable password implementation to the factory

{{{
PasswordFactory.add( NewPassword.class );
}}}


3. You can now do

{{{
// This should return a 'NewPassword' object
Password password = PasswordFactory.getInstance("MutablePasswordHere");
password.confirmPassword( "somePasswordHere" )
}}}
